original_title: Juste Pour Rire 2012 Gala La Planète Des Femmes
overview: This year, we are offering you, ladies, a Gala just for you. A Gala in which you will be the star. A Gala where you will be put on a pedestal for more than 100 minutes. 100 minutes of pampering yourself with compliments and jokes about you from our sweet host and his specially chosen guests.  Our delicious animator, lover of women, Stéphane Rousseau cordially invites you to YOUR Gala.  So call a babysitter for your guy and go to the Planet of Women, your Gala.
title: Juste Pour Rire 2012 Gala La Planète Des Femmes
